ComicInfo.Title: Rogue; Mammoth Pitfall!; The Rules of the Game
ComicInfo.Summary:
In "Rogue", Jack and Hannah deal with a rogue shivat (tyrannosaur) that has been terrorizing miners.
In "Mammoth Pitfall", Jack and Hannah set a trap for a wooly mammoth, as Hannah believes that the beasts can be domesticated. Their experiment is cut short by the arrival of Hammer Terhune, who wants Jack dead.
In "Rules of the Game", Jack and Hannah go for a drive that turns into a dangerous race against the forces of nature.
